alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 10 at 12:53PM MST until June 11 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON MST /1 PM MDT/ TO 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph, with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...The Eastern Mogollon and White Mountains, northward into the Little Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...From noon MST /1 PM MDT/ to 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; White Mountains
